# @appolabs/appo

> JavaScript bridge SDK for native app features in React Native WebViews.

The SDK provides a unified API for accessing native device capabilities (push notifications, biometrics, camera, location, haptics, storage, share, network, device info) from web applications running inside React Native WebViews. Communication uses a request/response bridge over `window.ReactNativeWebView.postMessage()` with automatic browser fallbacks for non-native environments.

## Quick Start

- [Getting Started](README.md#quick-start)
- [Installation](README.md#installation)
- [Initialization](README.md#initialization)

- [Push Notifications](README.md#push-notifications)

- [Storage](README.md#storage)
- [Share](README.md#share)
- [Network](README.md#network)
- [Device](README.md#device)
